[h2]Highlights[/h2] [list] [*]Added a SynTek Residential themed main menu background. [*]The camera feeds that display behind briefing have less static and are less distracting. [*]Many guns are now more accurate while crouching. [/list]
[h2]Weapons[/h2] [i]Weapon recoil has been changed on several guns. A coding error was previously causing "flattened" recoil to work differently when aiming north or south versus east or west.[/i] [list] [*][b]22A3-1 Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° (wide) × 03° (tall) → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]22A4-2 Combat Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]22A5 Heavy Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 06° × 03° → 06° × 01°. [*][b]22A7-Z Prototype Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]50CMG4-1:[/b] Normal spread: 20° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 20° × 10°. Crouch spread: 20° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 10° × 05°. [*][b]IAF Medical SMG:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]IAF Minigun:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]K80 Personal Defense Weapon:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]M42 Vindicator:[/b] Normal spread: 22° × 22° → 22° × 12°. Crouch spread: 22° × 22° → 16° × 06°. [*][b]Model 35 Pump-action Shotgun:[/b] Normal spread: 22° × 22° → 22° × 12°. Crouch spread: 22° × 22° → 16° × 06°. [*][b]PS50 Bulldog:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]S23A SynTek Autogun:[/b] Normal spread: 07° × 07° → 07° × 03°. Crouch spread: 07° × 07° → 04° × 01°. [/list]
[h2]Mission Improvements[/h2] [list] [*][b]Jacob's Rest: Cargo Elevator:[/b] Made the ceiling of the elevator slightly transparent to help with camera rotation. [*][b]Jacob's Rest: Cargo Elevator:[/b] Fixed some flickering on the exit door of the elevator. [*][b]Jacob's Rest: Deima Surface Bridge:[/b] Fixed some drone spawn locations on the bridge that resulted in stuck aliens. [*][b]Jacob's Rest: Deima Surface Bridge:[/b] Improved Onslaught spawning around the end of the bridge. [*][b]Research 7: Illyn Forest:[/b] Removed parasites from out-of-bounds eggs to improve performance. [*][b]Research 7: Jericho Mines:[/b] Removed parasites from out-of-bounds eggs to improve performance. [*][b]Tears for Tarnor: Abandoned Maintenance Tunnels:[/b] Fixed aliens getting stuck around the laser. [*][b]Tears for Tarnor: Oasis Colony Spaceport:[/b] Fixed a xenomite spawn location in the control room that wasn't working. [*][b]Tilarus-5: Arctic Infiltration:[/b] Fixed misleading collisions around the first airlock. [*][b]Tilarus-5: Communication Center Sweep:[/b] Fixed some rare crashes and improved visals. [*][b]Lana's Escape: Lana's Bridge:[/b] Fixed there sometimes not being enough hackable panels to fix the bridge. [*][b]Paranoia: Hostile Places:[/b] Minor visual improvements. [*][b]Paranoia: High Tension:[/b] Fixed some instances of the ground flickering. [*][b]Paranoia: Crucial Point:[/b] Reduced terrain complexity that did not affect gameplay or visuals for slightly faster load time. [*][b]Nam Humanum: Platform XVII:[/b] Fixed onslaught aliens spawning in midair along the platform track. [*][b]Nam Humanum: Groundwork Labs:[/b] Fixed marines after the first eight (in special game modes with more than eight marines) getting stuck at the start. [*][b]Nam Humanum: Groundwork Labs:[/b] Fixed a performance hitch when approaching the central area in multiplayer. [*][b]Reduction: Fallen City:[/b] Fixed a fire near some eggs at the end of the mission being very slow to ignite. [*][b]DM Desert:[/b] Fixed obstacles being tinted dark blue. [/list]
